pageContext.claim: “The USMCA also contains robust new provisions on digital trade and financial services, and the most ambitious environmental and labor protections ever placed into a major trade agreement anywhere at any time.”
pageContext.analysis: Many of the digital trade and labor provisions are lifted from the Trans Pacific Partnership, which Trump killed early in his term. The TPP was negotiated with 12 companies and so was larger than the new USMCA. Plus, the agreement does, however, provide great specifics on environmental issues than NAFTA did.
